root.name: Zoo Tycoon: Marine Mania
root.description: OverviewNew AnimalsMarine Mania features many new animals, Including:BelugaBottlenose DolphinGreat White SharkTiger SharkHammerhead SharkGreen TurtleNarwhalManta RayOrcaPacific WalrusSea OtterWest Indian ManateeShortfin Mako SharkHumpback WhaleHarbor PorpoiseElephant SealGiant SquidGiant Pacific OctopusSperm WhaleGreen Moray EelBluefin TunaLion's Mane JellyfishMermaid (Easter Egg) - Place a Mermaid statue in a tank then it will come to life.PlantsSea SpongeSeaweedSea dollarSea CucumberBarnacleKelpSea AnemoneStove Pipe Coral
